评论详情: I love this stunning Van Gogh themed oversized sweater. This is a man’s sweater as described, but I am a 5’5”, 110lbs female and I bought a sz small. It is comfortably roomy and great for layering. The look is very stylish and feel of the fabric is soft and not itchy. The writing, graphics are exquisite and it makes any thing from jeans to skirts looks very classy and is a great conversation piece. I’ve paired this sweater with ponte pants and ankle boots which looks simply fabulous and stylish. The seller is top notch, helpful and prompt in responding. I’ve additionally purchased a cable sweater from this seller which is equally beautiful and outstanding quality. I highly recommend this seller!! 👍

评论详情: This sweater is soft, thick, comfortable, and warm! I got in July because it was on sale, and hoped to wear it in the evening when things cooled down, but so far it hasn't been cool enough to wear this, which is only disappointing because I LOVE IT and want to wear it. I have no doubt it'll keep me toasty warm in cooler fall weather, and at just the right temperature during the winter months. I will be wearing it until it falls off of me, and intend to buy further sweaters from this brand.

The only review you need! :) 5’4 145lbs  I bought this sweater in fall of 2020 and I’ve loved it since day 1! It is my favorite sweater since 2020. The video and pics taken Thanksgiving Day 2022! 2 years later :o  Things to consider when buying:  1. Do not put this in the dryer if you don’t own a fabric/ lint razor as lint balls will form … see sleeves for reference (my sweater has been thrown in the dryer at least 100 times. I razored the front as best as I could today but didn’t get to the sleeves or back. So far it took me 30 min to remove the lint balls from just the front so learn from my mistakes. 😪)  2. Buy a size up if you want it super baggy. As you can see my M is oversized but not mid thigh so if you’re looking for a super baggy style, order up!  That’s all! Give me feedback on my review 🫶

Items does not run large as advertised, and the return process is misleading and beyond ridiculous with US based company requiring a return to China.  This isn’t the typical policy for free returns.  Read carefully!
